## Experience

I have been working primarily as a Strength and Conditioning Coach with elite winter sport athletes since 2015. Over the past 10 years I have been fortunate to coach multiple Olympic medalists while travelling all over the world, including the 2022 Olympic Winter Games in Beijing.
